thread.title: Actor Randy Quaid released from Vermont jail - KCRA-TV Sacramento
thread.title_full: Actor Randy Quaid released from Vermont jail - KCRA-TV Sacramento - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: KCRA-TV Sacramento
title: Actor Randy Quaid released from Vermont jail - KCRA-TV Sacramento
text:
Five years after fleeing to Canada while facing felony vandalism charges in California, actor Randy Quaid was back in the United States and in custody. The 65-year-old star of "Kingpin" and "Independence Day" was arrested along with his wife, Evi, as they were trying to cross from Quebec into Vermont, authorities said.
 KCRA-TV Sacramento.
